QuestData.Title: Blown Away
QuestData.Description: Please, $gmister:miss;, you just gotta help me!$b$bMy pa brought me a bunch of balloons from the Darkmoon Faire. Best... gift... EVER! They're magical, you know, and never lose their floatiness!$b$bThere's just one thing...$b$bA big ol' gust of wind blew 'em right outta my hands. They're scattered all over Orgrimmar!$b$bI'd chase after 'em myself, but this city's so big I'd get lost for sure.$b$bCan you round 'em up for me before they float away?$b$bPlease?
QuestData.LogDescription: Jaga wants you to collect 5 Windswept Balloons from Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find all of my balloons, $gmister:miss;?
QuestData.RewardText: This is GREAT! You did it!$b$bThanks, $gmister:miss;!
